short_summary: Visitor Experience Strategy for the Canadian National Vimy Memorial and the Beaumont-Hamel Newfoundland Memorial
description: The Veterans Affairs Canada requires the services of a contractor to provide planning, facilitation, analysis and writing services to create site-specific visitor experience strategies.
duration_in_months: The contract will be active from the date of contract to March 31, 2024
